name: Sound Forge Mac 2.0 - Steam Powered
detailed_description:
Sound Forge Mac 2 – Steam Powered is the all-in-one solution for recording, audio editing and post production of high resolution audio material. Take advantage of quick start and intuitive workflows, comprehensive editing tools and 64-bit AU and VST plug-ins.

Produce in high resolution quality


  • Recordings
    Recording multichannel sound on up to 32 channels and 24-bit/192 kHz.
  • Edit
    Configure various presets and within seconds switch between different project views. This way you can have an overview even of complex arrangements.
  • Post-produсtion
    Effects like the Wave Hammer compressor/limiter and zplane timestretching make Sound Forge Mac 2 – Steam Powered an audio editing powerhouse.
  • Export
    Render your projects in the most popular formats such as 3G2, 3GP, AAC, AIF, CAF, FLAC, M4A, MP3, MP4, OGG, SND, W64, and WAV.
  • User interface
    Sound Forge Pro 2 Mac – Steam Powered comes with a compact and streamlined program interface to match our customers' high efficiency and speed standards.
  • Editor panel
    Two separate editors, each with overview track, file tabs and transport controls make it easy to switch files for optimal editing.
  • Mediapool
    Get quick access to your media, preview files and drag audio material into your arrangement.
  • Metering
    Many visualizations give you graphic feedback according to industry standards. Includes VU and Peak Program Metering.
  • Plug-in selection
    A dedicated selection window for embedding plug-ins offers you quick access to VST and AU plug-ins, favorites, presets and custom selection.
  • Plug-in chainer
    Using plug-in chains you can achieve unique, non-destructive use of effects in your projects. Load plug-ins, change the sequence and monitor everything in realtime.

Editing


  • Regions and markers
    Create and label markers, make changes to your selection, create and share events and loops. Using the Region Tool, you can access the event list, together with the preview function.
  • Event editing
    Share your recordings as an unlimited number of segments on the timeline. Use crossfades, event and region markers and envelope curves to edit material.
  • File properties
    The Properties and Statistics tools let you view and edit the metadata of your audio files in a compact dialog.

Processing

 
Sound Forge Mac 2 – Steam Powered has numerous editing and mastering functions for high resolution audio files natively integrated.

  • Normalizing
    Conduct Peak Level or RMS normalization and easily align the loudness of two different recordings.
  • Fades
    Various types of fades give you control over your arrangement.
  • Mixing
    Mix files from cache memory with crossfades in your arrangement and individually adjust the volume of source and target files.
  • Channel converter
    With the converter, you can transform Surround files into stereo or invert channels, and much more.
  • Wave Hammer
    In addition to classic compression, this exclusive mastering plug-in also offers limiting functions.
  • Pitch editing
    Conduct time stretching and pitch shifting processes with the highest precision. Zplane élastique preserves any type of format and works free of artefacts even with strong manipulation.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks), 10.10 (Yosemite), or 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Core i3, Core i5, Core i7, or Xeon processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mac OS X-compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac OS X-compatible sound card
